trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> event when a Delete button is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>hendelse når en Delete-knappen eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>-metoden, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lastes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is one whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as canceling the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Slett-knappen er en der `CommandName` er satt til "Delete".) Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel avbryter sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A ListViewDeleteEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the index of the item that is being deleted.
trans-unit.target: En ListViewDeleteEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne indeksen for elementet som slettes.

trans-unit.source: You can also cancel the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også avbryte sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To do so, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the ListViewDeleteEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, angis i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>for ListViewDeleteEventArgs-objektet til `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If necessary, you can also work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> collections before the values are passed to the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hvis nødvendig, kan du også arbeide med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>samlinger før verdiene er sendt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ListViewDeleteEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av ListViewDeleteEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes primært av kontrollutviklere ved å heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A>|The value of the `itemIndex` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A>| Verdien for den `itemIndex` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the item that contains the Delete button that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for elementet som inneholder Delete-knappen som hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the item being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for elementet slettes.

trans-unit.source: Use the ItemIndex property to determine the index of the item being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ItemIndex-egenskapen til å fastslå indeksen for elementet slettes.

trans-unit.source: The item index is typically used to retrieve the specified item from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control, which enables you to access the item's properties.
trans-unit.target: Elementet indeksen brukes vanligvis til å hente det angitte elementet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll, slik at du kan få tilgang til elementets egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item being deleted.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for elementet slettes.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of field name/value pairs that represent the primary key or keys of the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for feltet Navn/verdi-par som representerer primærnøkkelen eller nøklene i elementet du vil slette.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is set, use the Keys property to access the value of the primary key or keys in the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen er angitt, bruke egenskapen nøkler til å få tilgang til primærnøkkelen eller nøkler i elementet du vil slette.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inneholder bare nøkkelfeltene for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To access the values of the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys dictionary is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the field or fields that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Nøkler ordlisten automatisk fylles ut med navn/verdi-par med feltet eller feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the primary key contains multiple fields, a separate entry is added to the Keys dictionary for each key field.
trans-unit.target: Hvis primærnøkkelen inneholder flere felt, legges en egen oppføring nøkler stavemåten for hvert felt.

trans-unit.source: To determine the name of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> object that is contained in the Keys dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på et felt i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekt som finnes i ordlisten nøkler.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of a key field, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for et nøkkelfelt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the name/value pairs that represent the primary key or keys of the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder navn/verdi-parene som representerer primærnøkkelen eller nøklene i elementet du vil slette.

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs in the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ordliste for ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par i elementet du vil slette.

trans-unit.source: Use the dictionary in the Values property to access the values of the non-key fields in the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ordlisten i egenskapen verdier for å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel i elementet du vil slette.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not contain the primary key field or fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen inneholder ikke den primære nøkkelfeltet eller felt.

trans-unit.source: To access the values of the primary key or keys, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til verdiene i primærnøkkelen eller nøkler, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Values property is automatically populated with the name/value pairs of the non-key fields in the item.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verdier fylles automatisk med navn/verdi-par med feltene ikke er en nøkkel i elementet.

trans-unit.source: A separate entry is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> property for each key field in the item.
trans-unit.target: En egen oppføring legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>-egenskapen for hver nøkkelfelt i elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the field name of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> object that is contained in the Values dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå navnet på en oppføring i <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>for en <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekt som finnes i ordlisten verdier.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To determine the value of an entry, use the <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: For å bestemme verdien for en oppføring, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the non-key field name/value pairs of the item to delete.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder ikke-nøkkelfelt navn/verdi-par med elementet du vil slette.
